title: Volume V: Le Rire du coq, L'Ile de Pâques, L'Intérieur de la vue, La Clé des chants (Volume V: The Rooster's Laugh, Easter Island, The Interior of Sight, The Key to Songs) from Une Semaine de bonté (A Week of Kindness or the Seven Deadly Elements)
medium: Volume V from a five volume serial novel with 182 line blocks after collages
